actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 96-771.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #104 (220-176).

official_title: A resolution providing funds for the Committee on Rules.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended, roll call #104 (220-176)) Authorizes the expenditure of funds, not to exceed $615,000, for investigations and studies to be conducted by the House Committee on Rules. Specifies that $30,000 of such funds are for the reimbursement of computer and computer-related services requested by such committee. Declares that no part of these funds shall be available for expenditure in connection with the study of any subject which is being investigated by any other House committee. Terminates the authorization granted by this resolution on January 3, 1981.

titles.title: A resolution providing funds for the Committee on Rules.
